text: "Love You" is a song recorded by American country music artist Jack Ingram. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Shaun Silva and premiered in June 22, 2006. The video debuted at number 19 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of August 24, 2006. The music video reached number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for the week of October 26, 2006. ==References== Category:2006 songs Category:Jack Ingram songs Category:Music videos directed by Shaun Silva
title: Love You
